section.title: RP 5 part 2
paragraph:
The review problem set for today contains five review problems.  The
first one (see previous chapter) is about grammars. The four remaining
problems are in this section.

paragraph.#text: This problem deals with the syntax and semantics of the  function.

list_item.paragraph:
How to add annotations to a Jison grammar to produce an
interpreter, rather than just a parser (see previous chapter)

paragraph.#text:

 functions. Note that this problem is randomized. You must

with it.
